The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--006a51241073e994b41acfe9ec718e94-->
### Code Coverage
For detailed information about the code coverage, see the [test coverage report](https://corecheck.dev/bitcoin/bitcoin/pulls/29129).
<!--021abf342d371248e50ceaed478a90ca-->
### Reviews
See [the guideline](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#code-review) for information on the review process.
| Type | Reviewers |
| ---- | --------- |
| Concept ACK | [BrandonOdiwuor](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29129#pullrequestreview-1793977794) |

If your review is incorrectly listed, please react with ð to this comment and the bot will ignore it on the next update.
<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#28710](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28710) (Remove the legacy wallet and BDB dependency by achow101)
* [#28574](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28574) (wallet: optimize migration process, batch db transactions by furszy)
* [#28333](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28333) (wallet: Construct ScriptPubKeyMans with all data rather than loaded progressively by achow101)
* [#28142](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28142) (wallet: Allow users to create a wallet that encrypts all database records by achow101)
* [#27788](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/27788) (rpc: Be able to access RPC parameters by name by achow101)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
Feels like this could be confused with real/beancounter accounts like we used to support years ago. Maybe `hd_account` or something?
